duties_responsibilities.duty: Research, write, capture visual content, and edit stories for multiple platforms.
Produce and present sports reports for all platforms.
Ensure that all sports content meets company standards for journalistic integrity and production quality.
Write and deliver sports stories in a clear and concise manner.
Assist in writing, copy editing, researching, and coordinating sports programming and other content.
Respond to breaking sports events and other urgent newsroom situations as required.
Work closely with the sports team to develop comprehensive sports coverage.
Participate in promotional activities including public appearances.
Perform special projects and other duties as assigned.
Set up, compose, and execute video shots.
Edit video clips for TV broadcasts and eMedia content.
Write stories for the website and other eMedia platforms.
Interact with viewers and users on social media sites.
Complete educational requirements such as obtaining a Bachelor’s degree in Broadcast Journalism, or a related field, or an equivalent combination of education and work-related experience.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Broadcast Journalism or a related field
